name: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection
name_original: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection
description:
The tables are recreated and played in stunning 3D and presented as
photo-realistically as possible. The game play, visuals, and sound
effects are authentic and the atmosphere takes the player back to an
awesome late 80s style arcade.

Features

• 7 of your favorite classic Pinball tables perfectly re-created on the
3DS
• Enjoy hours of fun with several different gameplay modes and
unlockable features to discover
